content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the impact of improvements in transportation systems on agriculture?

choices.label: Local markets have become more important for dairy farmers.
Individual farms have become more diversified.
Corporate farms have gained a greater advantage over family farms.
Subsistence farmers are given great advantages.

content.answer: Corporate farms have gained a greater advantage over family farms.
